title: [多圖][應該超長篇]從日本一周到隔離兩週，工作假期遊記 (1) 北海道·東北北部篇

replies.msg:
P牌仔，多多支持

返左香港4個月，工又搵到，生活都回復如常(咁廢)，係時候總結番上年成年嘅經歷。

WH從中學嗰時就好想去，但係一直驚自已唔識講日文又驚影響前途，所以放低左咁多年，直至前年做野做到開始懷疑人生，諗番起WH呢樣野。
反正(嗰時)做緊閪工人工低，屋企人又好支持我出去闖下，完全無野好輸


識玩緊係日本一周啦 ，淨係喺東京大阪呢啲大城市做野根本就係浪費左好多景點
藍點都係呢年黎去過嘅景點(扣除北陸同茨城係之前旅行去左)，雖然重有好多因為行程同時間關係去唔到，但係都差唔多玩左40個都道府縣
為左咁轉左六份工每份做左個零兩個月，由農場都旅館都做過。

北海道

搭親機有意無意差唔多次次都係機翼位

一輪折騰後到達工作地方(WWOOF無錢收，純打工換宿，所以唔算工作，旅遊簽證都做得，不過係法律灰色地帶)嘅出面塊田，中間啡色嗰塊係第二人家嘅唔關我事

時值五月，係油菜花當造期，最吸引到我嘅係一片花海，都係第二人家嘅
我做嘅農場奉行自然農法，除左無農藥，重唔灑水唔落肥(基本上)全人手，唔會有咁有規模咁整然嘅田，啲相都係散步時影
講真好少影工作時嘅相


啱啱去到做野，除左宿主(Host)夫婦外重有一個法國女仔，開頭以為係熱情大姐姐點知原來係鄰家女孩。我黎之後幾日佢就去左其他地方WWOOF。之後黎左三個畢業旅行嘅京都女中學生，再之後係另一個女仔然後係年年都黎嘅大叔。
工作內容不外乎灑水(雖然講左唔灑水，但係幼苗太脆弱點都要每日曬下提高生存率同產量)，種種子，耕土除草。上圖係蕃茄田，搭棚係俾蕃茄藤繞上去，同你用盤栽種蕃茄插支竹落去一樣，種茄子青椒同樣原理。
除左上面三隻，重有種豆、薯仔、翠玉瓜、蒜苗等等。係少種多品目嘅農場。種完會經網絡商店賣到全日本，不過賺返黎都係僅僅夠生活用

日日晚餐飲SAPPORO好正

除左農務外有好多時間做其他野
(WWOOF規定一日最多做六個鐘，當然成個日本咁大管唔曬，有啲無良Host會要求做八個鐘，睇你妥唔妥協，不過我無遇到，兩次WWOOF嘅Host都係經驗豐富又守規矩)

浸溫泉(圖係溫泉旁邊嘅公園)北海道除左登別出名外，四圍都有天然溫泉，試過一個滑潺潺嘅對皮膚好咁話。不過我麻麻地鐘意浸溫泉

當日個天靚到


三個蜂斗菜下嘅小矮人(コロポックル)
(橙色頭係Host，荒さん)
*蜂斗菜:蕗(ふき)，北海道品種通常係秋田蕗，但至少比東北嘅秋田蕗大幾倍
*コロポックル:愛奴(阿伊努)族神話中嘅精靈，意思普遍認為係「蜂斗菜下的人」 (有睇通靈王嘅應該知係乜)


煙燻爐，想做煙燻好耐，唔係講用鐵鍋燻，係燻至少六個鐘嗰種中低溫煙燻。奈何香港咁窄好難搞。咁啱Host有養雞，研究緊雞蛋料理，又咁啱傾起我想試下煙燻，一拍即合。
我整完櫻木燻蛋，終於知道幸福傷風素櫻桃味真係櫻桃味


搭薄餅爐，個爐本來係上幾手WWOOFer搭嘅，不過塌左。
做完個煙燻爐之後我地夾手夾腳起返。用泥沙同乾草做爐。加上北海道盛產的輕石(之後再補充)做基底，充滿北海道特色。
圖就燒麵包，但係之後真有燒薄餅


臨走前再起多個灶(未完成)，咁啱有一家人黎幫手農務順便一齊搞，由採石到搭灶從頭開始。

既然問到，講多少少背景資料。 sor for 1999
鼓起勇氣出走嘅契機係之前份工。嗰時繁忙期又咁啱撞正audit要準備，每日OT2-3個鐘差唔多半年咁耐(當然比起其他公司甚至其他部門唔係好多)
前輩為個audit出力出命，死都死份文件出黎但係都係無回報甚至被屌，有啲關係幾好嘅前輩都因為咁之後灰到走左
我淨係做左幾年野無佢地咁多野搞，但係見到咁撚多野做又見到佢地咁辛苦，心諗唔想未來好似佢地咁(就算係都想癲番一次先面對)
做做下野突然萌生起去日本讀書嘅念頭，不過讀咩好、讀完又點，完全無頭緒。然後就諗WH。
一早請左假去日本窮遊，撞正audit中段，正好測試自己獨立能力。完全無問題，咁就申請WH。
戴番頂帽先，同同事相處自認幾好，上司都對我好好，閪嘅係個行業。
決定係衝動，有好多人慘過我都無逃避現實，但我無後悔。

差啲唔記得講，日文方面。 日文能力決定你嘅自由度。
日本係有好多工唔需要識日文，工廠/Hostel清潔等上去FB或者背包客棧睇下一定有。想經中介搵工都得，不過中介費扣到HIHI 唔好唔記得重有保險+20%稅(視乎公司，可退回)
(順帶一題國民年金唔洗俾，國民年金唔洗俾，國民年金唔洗俾)
有更多工係老闆淨係識日文/工作性質要識講日文，你想旅遊區嘅可以做酒店/Hostel櫃台;你想山旮旯嘅可以農場/旅館/滑雪場。
唔理你N幾，你識講，日本人又明你講乜就已經夠你打工打遍成個日本。
我搵嘅工都包食宿(未必包錢)，所以淨舉以上例子。聽朋友講有人靠玩街機賣卡就夠佢讀master+生活

揀北海道開始嘅邏輯係咁:
要環遊日本→要輕便(最重要係孤寒唔想俾行李費)→唔帶得太多衫→唔可以冬天去北海道→咁就夏天去
而工作地點揀喺千歲市: 近機場方便接送交通費慳番，又近札幌，添置物品方便，出去玩更方便



如是者，佔盡地理優勢下，第一次放假就去左札幌
大通公園，真真正正嘅城市綠州。當日30度(北海道喎)好多人都喺度休息，有人野餐、細路玩水、都有人練雜技。就算你戴著面具或者cos著play跳舞都無人管你(咁啱今日⑨/⑨)

5月30號，ガエルさん(個法國女仔)最後一日，佢去第二度wwoof之前要去札幌同條仔住幾日(條仔喺札幌租左屋，讀緊日文)，host順便車埋我出去。反正我要買sim卡，啱曬。
當日有拉面節，食埋拉面先分開。三個外國人用日文溝通，兩位日文水平同我差唔多，溝通完全無問題(考慮佢地係印歐語系嘅人，學日文難度高好多)


同兩人分開後，係時候完成我嘅目標。唔只呢間，我目標係全國嘅一之宮。
*一之宮:古日本律令國(當係諸侯國啦)國內最高級嘅神社，例如嚴島神社係安藝國一之宮。律令國飛鳥時代(592-710)定立，一之宮又係平安時代定嘅，明治先發展嘅北海道一開頭自然無一之宮啦，有都係明治元年嘅事。
無乜特別原因，想睇下古建築同收御朱印。

集神祐、打卡、書法於一身，做手信一流


三大令人失望景點之一，札幌時計台

He loves kickboxing. He's lucky because his professor grants permission to use the cage and ring at university. His elder brother has also received a forty five million six hundred twelve thousand dollar research grant for research into space elevator there. He's been having a crush on this girl named Jo for eight years but Jo has a boyfriend. His friend said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive." But he's beginning to realize he has no place in her scheme of things. He's just being a doormat so I told him yo forget her. She's just not worth it. His eldest brother is applying for a resesrch grant for resesrch on flying cars while his elder sister is studying artificial intelligence there. Last Friday after supper, she hurried back home. I asked "Why all the hurry?" It turns out that the money for her student grant is about to dry up in which case she won't be able to continue with her studies. That's why she's in desperate hurry to find a job. In addition, I lent her a textbook who said she would let me have it back next week but I said "That's okay. There isn't any great hurry." Naoki's great great grandfather was a clarinetist during the romantic period who started off by performing in salons and progressed to concert halls. He died in a forest at the age of ninety nine. There was abundant compelling evidence that a hailstorm was a contributory factor in the accident. His younger sister started off her career as a junior accountant in a local accounting firm then progressed tp an accounting manager in an international firm. I had a friendly chat with her the other day. We started off discussing her career plans and gradually the conversation progressed to our favorite movies. Project Gutenberg is worth seeing for its three-D effects and the excitement it generates. I saw it twice on the big screen and watched it three more times on DVD when it was off the big screen. It kept me on the edge of my seat the entire time. The movie fulfilled my expectation. The majority of the movie is flashbacks to the incidents before Lee Man is arrested. There's an unexpected twist in the plot toward the end of the movie. The Mummy is also a worthwhile movie which starts with a flashback to Imhotep's past. His eldest sister started off her career as a security guard but quickly progressed to a manager. I enjoy chatting with her but whenever we chat we never seem to progress beyond her favorite sport, baseball. She loves painting but alas she has no talent for it. She never progressed beyond the stage of painting cartoon characters. She's been wondering about setting up a hotel business in Central. I think it's worth a try as she has a razor-sharp mind. My auntie too thinks it's worth giving it a go. She'll try to get sanctions for building it in Central. I would imagine the government will sanction her proposals. Naoki has opened a sports retailer. He has got sixty two million nine hundred eleven thousand dollars' worth of gym and boxing equipment in his store. Over eighteen million one hundred thirty three thousand dollars' worth of jacuzzi tubs, boxing rings and fitness machines have been shipped nationwide over the last fourteen months so he's doing a fantastic job of it. He loves gambling. In fact, he's on his way to a casino where he'll up the ante on the roulette wheel this time which he's excited about. He did five hours' worth of work this afternoon though before heading for the casino. He has a Chanel watchband worth seventy nine dollars. His Lamborghini is worth one million three hundred thousand dollars.

He's worth half a million whereas his girlfriend must be worth over fifty million. He's a god-fearing churchgoer who says his prayers every night before going to sleep. He's been having recurring flashbacks of a car crash recently after seeing a car accident on the news so yesterday, he went to the church and asked a pastor from his church to pray for him. His church stresses the importance of daily prayer in the life of a Christian. He's bought a house lately. He's done five weeks' worth of furniture shopping for it but it'll need a lot more work before he can move in. He asked me about selling his original house. I said "Your best bet would be to sell it this year." This Saturday, the property developer will be giving a talk on the facilities it's planning on building for the clubhouse which is worth his attention. It'll soak up eighty percent of its budget. He's a kickboxing fan. The promoter has announced that a rematch between Shane and Oscar is in the works. In their first fight, Shane started off the match with a right cross followed by a left uppercut which knocked Oscar out. Apparently, Oscar suffered from a minor injury which took the edge of his performance. Both are fantastic fighters but in a rematch, I think Oscar will edge the fight. The fans are excited about the rematch but Shane has upped the ante by demanding a salary two times more. Hopefully the rematch will eventually happen. In January, John will be fighting Dom. If he tests positive for steroids again, the fans will be terribly disappointed in him. The promoter too will be bitterly disappointed with him since last year, two of his tests came back positive. As a result, he was suspended for nine months. However, if he loses because of ring rust due to having been suspended for nine months, the fans including me will be deeply disappointed at the result. My brother who's a fan of him too will be terribly disappointed by the fact that he loses due to ring rust because of having been suspended. Last year, I was bitterly disappointed to find his fight against Dan was overturned to a no contest. The fans was deeply disappointed to hear he would be suspended too. Five years ago, John fought Matt in which he was disqualified for landing illegal downward elbows. Therefore, he lost by disqualification by which I was a bit disappointed. Two years later, he used yet another illegal move in a fight against Anthony which was a knee to the grounded opponent's head. The referee could've stopped the fight which would've been a cheap triumph for Anthony but fortunately he didn't. Instead, he called for a timeout to let him have a rest. John said in the post-fight press conference that when the referee called a timeout, he immediately had flashbacks of his fight against Matt. The promoter of the organization sometimes pretends to be a fighter's friend but will sell him down the river the moment it makes financial sense for him. He pretended like he was Tito's friend but once his prime had passed, he sold him down the river by dismissing him. Like swimming, kickboxing requires an exquisite sense of timing. It used to be huge in Japan but not that today, it's most popular in America but not that popular in the global scheme of things. I'm planning on retrofitting my boxing gym with a ring and a cage. They're worth having as they make sparring more effective. A retrofit for my personal gym room is necessary too whuch involves putting in a lat pulldown machine. The book "Martial Arts Styles" is worth reading as it teaches you the correct and effective ways of landing punches and kicks as well as executing submissions.

7月7號，一大清早check out出到去就見到一排人推著花車喺馬路上行，睇黎七夕弘前有祭典搞
弘前俾我印象係比青森市更加現代化嘅城市。從JR行到大街途經住宅區，一路上有啲時尙嘅鋪頭之類，又有小型戲水池(感覺上似香港新型屋邨嗰種下鋪上居咁)。咁啱星期日嗰個住宅區有朝市，不過賣嘅係花、衫、自製食品etc，完全for居民嘅


行番去JR附近搭巴士睇神社。車上幾乎都係登山客，個個都喺神社前落車，好似得我一個淨係為左拜神
弘前出名雪糕，喺岩木山神社出面啲阿婆一早已經準備擺攤(市內都見到差唔多款嘅小販，似係特許經營)。其中有一個阿婆搭我訕，問我係唔係行山.....我無班友咁勁，我淨係為左拜拜咋


岩木山神社相傳始建於1200年前，之後由坂上田村麻呂修建改址到山下面(田村麿係第二代征夷大將軍，唔似豐臣德川咁得個名，人地真係征過(蝦)夷，所以有唔少東北嘅景點都關佢事)，另外神社有北門鎮護嘅稱號，應該係因為當時日本(大和民族)領土未去到北海道，青森已經係最北邊境

有話岩木山神社因為構造似日光東照宮所以又被叫做奧日光。之前去過東照宮，對比一下先

斗栱、地台、彫刻都幾似嘅，不過色調就完全唔一樣，而且東照宮好多屋簷都係用唐破風*。一半一半似啦

*唐破風雖然叫唐，但係無證據話關支那事。睇番資料，現時中國幾乎無唐破風嘅古蹟，就算有都係抄日本嘅。考試唔考，但係記著唔好俾支那話呢樣係佢發祥

但人地岩木山神社比東照宮早起差唔多成千年，點解反而俾人話似東照宮。咁講凌波麗夠係抄長門有希架啦
可能係德川家康想自比做田村麿咁勁所以抄考左建築風格啩


神社出名呢個靈異點(心霊スポット).......就係水龍頭三個，神聖還神聖，一啲都唔靈異囉



津輕國一之宮get。呢個同北海道神宮(蝦夷國)都算係新一之宮，因為原本東北(唔計山形新潟)都係陸奧國範圍，後來先拆細成幾個國
順便貼埋之唔記得左嘅恐山御朱印


臨走買番杯雪糕(應該係雪葩?)食 ，既然個阿婆搵我搭訕，都係幫襯佢啦


番到市中心喺鋪頭(睇落似廠)買左另一杯，完全唔同嘅，雪糕硬掘掘，脆筒又唔脆，失敗。


重傳建，重要傳統的建造物群保存地區。簡單黎講就係保存古舊建築嘅街道。弘前城隔籬嗰個係仲町。可能時間尚早，冇人得我一個遊客，管理員都係啱啱準備開門。
入到去無乜特別，普通民居幾個(不過已經係當時武家階層嘅住宅)。好似明白晒點解無遊客黎參觀。
而且啲管理員好熱情好落力同我介紹(雖然口音好重唔係聽得好清楚)，係唔係因為太得閑太寂寞，難得有遊客黎所以先咁落力
